statements: SELECT * FROM EmissionData WHERE facility_name = 'Facility A';
SELECT facility_name, emission_level, measurement_unit FROM EmissionData WHERE emission_level > 100;
SELECT * FROM EmissionData WHERE location = 'City X' ORDER BY emission_level DESC;
SELECT facility_name, location, timestamp FROM EmissionData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT DISTINCT facility_name, location FROM EmissionData;
SELECT * FROM EmissionData WHERE facility_name = 'ABC Corp' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT facility_name, emission_type, emission_level FROM EmissionData WHERE location = 'New York' AND timestamp >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM EmissionData WHERE emission_type = 'CO2' AND measurement_unit = 'ppm' ORDER BY facility_name;
SELECT id, location, emission_type, timestamp FROM EmissionData WHERE emission_level > 1000 AND location LIKE '%California%' ORDER BY id DESC;

SELECT facility_name, MAX(emission_level) AS max_emission_level, MIN(emission_level) AS min_emission_level FROM EmissionData GROUP BY facility_name HAVING max_emission_level > 5000 ORDER BY min_emission_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM emission_levels
SELECT facility_id, emission_type, emission_level FROM emission_levels WHERE facility_id = 123
SELECT timestamp, emission_type, emission_level FROM emission_levels ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT facility_name, location, capacity FROM facility_data WHERE location LIKE 'New%'
SELECT facility_name, start_date FROM facility_data ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, location FROM facility_data WHERE capacity > 1000
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, location FROM facility_data WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM emission_levels WHERE emission_type = 'CO2' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT facility_id, SUM(emission_level) AS total_emissions FROM emission_levels GROUP BY facility_id
SELECT facility_name, AVG(capacity) AS avg_capacity FROM facility_data GROUP BY facility_name HAVING avg_capacity > 500
SELECT * FROM EmissionLevels;
SELECT facility_id, emission_level, emission_date FROM EmissionLevels ORDER BY emission_date DESC;
SELECT facility_name, location, capacity FROM WasteToEnergyFacilities WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT assessment_id, environmental_impact FROM EnvironmentalImpactAssessment ORDER BY assessment_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM EmissionLevels WHERE facility_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM EmissionLevels ORDER BY emission_date DESC, id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT facility_id, emission_level FROM EmissionLevels WHERE emission_level > 100 ORDER BY facility_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM WasteToEnergyFacilities WHERE location = 'California' OR location = 'New York' ORDER BY facility_name ASC;
SELECT facility_id, capacity FROM WasteToEnergyFacilities ORDER BY capacity DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT assessment_id, facility_id, assessment_date FROM EnvironmentalImpactAssessment WHERE environmental_impact = 'High' ORDER BY assessment_date DESC, assessment_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM EmissionData;
SELECT facility_name, emission_level FROM EmissionData ORDER BY emission_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM Facility WHERE location='New York';
SELECT id, facility_name FROM EmissionData WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT facility_id, source_type, equipment FROM EmissionSources WHERE emission_rate > 100;
SELECT * FROM EmissionData;
SELECT facility_name, date, emission_level FROM EmissionData ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_emission_count, SUM(emission_level) as total_emission_sum FROM EmissionData;
SELECT e.facility_name, f.name AS facility_name, e.emission_level, o.start_date FROM EmissionData e INNER JOIN Facility f ON e.facility_name = f.name INNER JOIN Operation o ON f.id = o.facility_id;
SELECT s.source_type, s.equipment, s.emission_rate, o.start_date FROM EmissionSources s JOIN Operation o ON s.operation_id = o.id WHERE s.source_type = 'Stack';
SELECT * FROM EmissionLevels;
SELECT date, emission_level FROM EmissionLevels ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT operation_name, emission_level FROM Operations, EmissionLevels WHERE Operations.id = EmissionLevels.operation_id;
SELECT plant_name, location, emission_value FROM Plants JOIN PlantEmissions ON Plants.id = PlantEmissions.plant_id;
SELECT source_name, SUM(emission_value) AS total_emissions FROM EmissionSources JOIN PlantEmissions ON EmissionSources.id = PlantEmissions.source_id GROUP BY source_name;
SELECT * FROM EmissionLevels ORDER BY date DESC, id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM Plants WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT operation_name, MAX(emission_level) FROM EmissionLevels JOIN Operations ON EmissionLevels.operation_id = Operations.id GROUP BY operation_name;
SELECT plant_name, SUM(emission_value) AS total_emissions FROM Plants JOIN PlantEmissions ON Plants.id = PlantEmissions.plant_id GROUP BY plant_name ORDER BY total_emissions DESC;
SELECT source_name, AVG(emission_value) AS avg_emission FROM EmissionSources JOIN PlantEmissions ON EmissionSources.id = PlantEmissions.source_id GROUP BY source_name HAVING avg_emission > 50;
